name: Krida Vikas Sanstha

address: St. Ursula's Premises, Red Cross Road

briefDescription: Slum Soccer uses the sport of football as a tool for social inclusion and development. Since inception, we have brought a positive influence in the lives of nearly 80,000 men, women and children all over the country. Slum Soccer is the Indian National Partner to the Homeless World Cup, a member of streetfootballworld's network and has partnerships with the British High Commission, The Hindu, Coaches across Continents and One World Futbol.
